description: Get all import definitions from a given file.

arguments.name: files
arguments.description: One or more Python source files that need their imports sorted.

options.name: --help
options.description: show this help message and exit

options.name: --top-only
options.description: Only identify imports that occur in before functions or classes.

options.name: --follow-links
options.description: Tells isort to follow symlinks that are encountered when running recursively.

options.name: --unique
options.description: If true, isort will only identify unique imports.

options.name: --packages
options.description: If true, isort will only identify the unique top level modules imported.

options.name: --modules
options.description: If true, isort will only identify the unique modules imported.

options.name: --attributes
options.description: If true, isort will only identify the unique attributes imported.
